Enicia! Welcome... What's wrong? You look down.
Hello, \n[2]. Actually, I have something to discuss...

I told her that the church's land ownership papers were missing and
that it had become the property of the Jemmett Company... And that
Enicia had taken on debt to buy back that land.

If only I had been a little more careful, this wouldn't have
happened...

…………I wonder... The Jemmett Company on the shady street... I've heard
rumors since I started my business, but it seems like they're doing
some pretty shady things.

That's right, they might even steal the land ownership papers. They're
that kind of people.

I-I don't want to believe that there are people who would do such a
thing... Even if they did, there's no evidence...

Well... In any case, now that we've made the contract, we have to
think about Enicia's debt. We've only just started, but if we sell
this shop, we can make a little extra...
Please stop, \n[2]! I didn't come here to cause trouble for my friend.

I don't think it's a bother. It's just strange that a simple nun like
Enicia has to go through something like this.

I started this shop to repay the orphanage. Even though the priest has
passed away, I still want to help Enicia and those children.

……If you think that way, please continue running this shop. And \n[2],
you borrowed money when you set up this shop, right? You haven't paid
it back yet.
So, don't worry. I just came to listen to the story, Enicia.
Hmm... I understand. Anyway, I'll listen to your story.
Enicia asks if there is a place where she can work and earn money.

Hmm... Well, there are places that are recruiting workers... But if
Enicia wants to do it and earn a decent amount...

(…If it's Enicia, I think she can earn money by working at that shop
over there... Hikage no Hana on the shady street... But I can't
recommend such a place to my friend, so of course it's rejected...)

It's nothing. Ah, come to think of it, I think the nearby Golden
Barrel tavern was recruiting workers. The salary there should be
pretty good.
A tavern, huh? Thank you, \n[2]. I'll go check it out.

Yeah... It's a bit difficult to earn that much money at a tavern. It
might be better to think of a way to earn a more substantial amount
eventually.

Anyway, don't take on too much by yourself. If worse comes to worst,
I'll sell the shop.

Why do you want to sell it so badly? If you do something like that,
I'll be angry, you know? Really.

(For now... Shall we go check out the tavern that \n[2] recommended?
It's just to the west.)

parameters.purpose:
To search for work, let's go to the bar that
\c[6]Wisely\c[0] told us about. Let's search for a shop
called \c[6]Golden Barrel\c[0] on Horseshoe Street.

parameters: テキスト = 仕事を探すため、\c[6]ウィゼ\c[0]に教えてもらった…
Oh my, did you come to worry about me? I'm sorry, Elysia...

I'm Enicia, Doctor. Anyway, I heard that you suddenly collapsed. Is
there something wrong with you?

Oh my, saying that I collapsed is an exaggeration. I haven't been
feeling well lately and suddenly I became so tired that I couldn't
walk...

I see... Anyway, don't worry, I'll make sure to make you feel better
even if it's just a little bit...
(Hmm, why... I feel like the healing magic isn't working...?)

(As I thought, this is strange. The magic should have been activated
properly... Could it be...)
……Doctor, do you have any black bruises or anything like that somewhere?

A bruise... Ah, come to think of it, I've had one on my right leg for
a while... I thought I might have bumped into something...
……Let me see it for a moment.

While feeling a bad premonition... Enicia examines \n[61]'s right leg.
Then, there was a black bruise that looked like a vague pattern there.
(As I thought... is this \c[6]Black Mark Disease\c[0]...!?)

Enicia rushed to the clinic on the Old King Street... Narsia was
carried to the sickroom after a while.

From now on, it will be a \c[6]search map\c[0] (board game). Time will
pass when you return. Is that okay?

The small church of Saint Luminea, belonging to the old and worn-out
Lesta religion in the former capital Megista, was being managed by the
nun Enicia as a substitute due to a serious shortage of personnel.

However, one day, a suspicious man who called himself \n[21] from the
Jimet Trading Company came and claimed that the company had the rights
to the church's land. Since the original deed that should have been in
the possession of the church could not be found, Enicia had no choice
but to accept it.

For the sake of the children in the attached orphanage, Enicia could
not let go of the church, so she complied with his request and ended
up in debt.

Through a contract called the Contract Mark, Enicia was able to
receive a promise of repayment and a grace period until repayment. She
somehow managed to earn the money by the due date...

parameters.purpose:
Thanks to the proposal of \n[21], we no longer have to worry
about interest. However, there is still a lot of debt
remaining. Let's look for other jobs and work hard to save
money.

parameters: テキスト = \n[21]の提案により、利子の心配はいらなくなった。…
休んで体力と気力を回復させます。

Enicia's underwear is visible from her short skirt... Even if it's
seen due to the contract, she can't hide it...
\>You can remove dirt from your body

Welcome. If you're going to enter the bath, please buy an admission
ticket. The women's changing room is on the right.

The women's bath has deteriorated over the years and is falling apart.
There are few available craftsmen, so it seems it will take some time
to fix it. I'm sorry, but please use the shared bath for the time
being.
A customer...? Understood, I'll go right away.

Nice to meet you. Oh, you are as beautiful as the rumors say. I am
\c[6]Jimet Trading Company's \n[21]\c[0].

My name is Enicia, a nun. What business do you have with me,
\n[21]-sama...?

It's difficult to say, but... we're having trouble with someone
illegally occupying this land here.

Literally... This land here is owned by our \c[6]Jimet Trading
Company\c[0]... Yes.

Excuse me... Is there some kind of mistake? This is a church built to
commemorate the saint \n[6] who died a martyr in this land. It is a
land that has been managed by the Rista Church since ancient times.

Oh, the Saint \n[6]... The person who is said to have stood up against
the tyrant \n[41] and saved this Megista. Of course, I am aware of
that.
So, have you understood that it was a misunderstanding?

No, that's a different matter... Leaving aside the history, the rights
to this land belong to us.

Even if you say that... we have the land ownership papers here. It
seems like there is some misunderstanding...

Oh, the land ownership papers! In that case, it's a simple matter. May
I see those papers? If so, we will understand and withdraw.

(The document that proves the ownership of the land is \c[6]in the safe
in the office\c[0]. If we show it to them, they should understand and
withdraw.)

Hey \n[16], you ate my snack, didn't you?

\n[13] Since it wasn't there, I thought you didn't need it.... It was
delicious.... Hah....

Hey, \n[16], \n[13]. Don't fight in the chapel. Even Lord Rista is

Ow... It's no use... I'm exhausted...

But, if you apologize properly \n[13], I'll forgive you. Can you do

I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm

Enicia nee-chan, this person is scary!

Anyway, it will soon be dark, so let's go back to the orphanage. I'll

Did you eat my snack and you're still hungry...

A small church stands in the old-fashioned town. This is the church of
the Lester religion located on the Horseshoe Street of the former
capital Megista.

The Lester religion is a teaching by the omniscient and omnipotent god
Lester. It spreads to every corner of the continent, and believers
exist throughout the land.

However, in this former capital Megista, its power has weakened since
a certain period of time, and only a few small churches remain. This
Holy \n[6] Small Church\c[0] was one of them.

Within the church grounds, there is an orphanage. Six boys and girls
live there, and Enicia takes care of them while also managing the
church.

Enicia, who is a nun, manages the church alone due to certain
circumstances. She spends her busy days praying with people who visit
daily, listening to their troubles, and watching over the growth of
the orphans.

Hello, Enicia-chan. Hahaha, it seems like those kids were fighting
again today.

[25] Thank you for always taking care of us. Those two, 
[13] and

[16], are especially mischievous...

It must be tough managing the church and taking care of the orphans
too, right? The other day, Chan opened a shop and left the orphanage,
so I'm worried that Enicia might collapse.

It's okay. The children at the orphanage are being taken care of by
Nurseia. Although she's getting up there in age...

Also, since \n[2] left, \n[12] has been bringing everyone together. It
seems like she's becoming more aware of her role as an older sister.

Thanks to \n[25]'s help with the church chores, my burden has been
greatly reduced.

……Even after I took over here as a substitute when the priest passed
away, you still care for us... I don't know how to thank you enough.
It's okay. If I can be of help to Enicia-chan, I'm happy too.

(...\n[8] Grandpa... It's been almost a year since the priest passed away.
Even though we sent a letter to the diocese, the replacement priest
still hasn't come...)

Enicia herself was an orphan who was picked up by the previous priest
when she was young and raised in the orphanage attached to this
church. She was very fond of \n[8], who she looked up to as a parent,
but he passed away due to old age about a year ago.

Since then, I have been somehow managing the church's duties as a
substitute for the priest, but even after all this time, the
replacement priest has not come, and there has been no contact from
the headquarters of the church, the Gospel Agency.

(... Has the Gospel Agency abandoned this Megista...? No, that can't be
right. Thanks to \n[25], we're managing somehow for now. Let's wait a
little longer.)

(…\n[25] Grandpa has been helping us a lot by assisting with the church
chores and taking care of those children. However...)

\n[25] is a middle-aged member of the Rista congregation who lives
nearby and has been visiting the church frequently since the time when
\n[8] was still alive as a priest.

She has been donating and helping us since a long time ago, but after
the priest passed away, she started helping Enicia like this.

It was definitely appreciated from the bottom of her heart. However...
there were also some things that bothered her.
(Recently, she seems to be looking at me intently more often...)

(…Not just my face, but also my... chest and such... Is there something
bothering her...?)

Through the sticky gaze of \n[25], Enicia felt like she was being
directed towards an indescribable emotion. She didn't know what it was
exactly.

(Enicia-chan... You're such a kind and good girl... And you've grown up
to be so beautiful...)
Busy yet peaceful days. Enicia thought that such days would continue.
And then, one evening after some time had passed...

Hello. My name is \n[35]. Actually, I came to consult with you about
something.

That emblem... Sir Knight...? My name is Enicia. What kind of
consultation is it?

Enicia, do you know that there have been frequent reports of evil
spirits in this city of Megista for quite some time now?

Yes, of course. Originally, it is something that we of the Rista
Church should be resolving, but...

No... The Rista Church has been decreasing in this city for quite some
time now. Even in this historic St. \n[6] Mary's Church, it seems that
no new priests have come.

Ah, please don't apologize. I don't intend to blame you. It's an
unavoidable situation.

……Between us, Lord \n[6] actually has the opposite idea. He thinks that
the commotion with the evil spirits is meant to undermine the
authority of the church.

In Megista, there have been various suspicious incidents happening
aside from this commotion with the evil spirits... There are many
unnatural points to this uproar.

If it is intentionally caused, there is no doubt that it will bring
disaster to Megista.
Certainly, if that is true, it is a very frightening thing...

……Well, it's not like I have to tell you about the situation in the
city. More importantly, I heard that you can handle sacred arts.

I am inexperienced to say that I can handle it, as I have not learned
it properly... However, I can use some basic sacred arts that have
been passed down in the church.

I see... However, sacred arts cannot be used without the aptitude even
for clergymen. The fact that you can use them is proof that you are a
wonderful clergyman.
Like me, a nun like this... so nervous...
Can we exorcise the evil spirits with purification magic?

Um, I have learned the basics, but with my inexperienced skills... I
wonder how effective it will be...

It's worth a try. Can I ask for your help? We can't just leave the
commotion with the evil spirits happening now as it is. We need your
cooperation for that.

(......Oh dear, wh-what should I do.... I can't refuse a request from the
knight...)

If you cooperate, we can offer financial assistance. I've heard that
donations have decreased and it's been difficult to maintain the
church and orphanage.
……I understand the situation. But... um, well... ugh...
……？　If there is something, please tell me clearly.
……No, I understand. I gratefully accept your offer.
Oh, I see. Then please come to the Old King Street on another day.
……I can't say it... that I'm scared of ghosts... ugh...

……But now that I've accepted, I have to do it. It's a fact that the
people in the town are also in trouble...
Oh...? Sir Knight? What brings you here today?
Enicia-san. Actually, it seems that the lord wants to talk to you.
Eh...!? Did I do something wrong...?

It probably isn't bad news. I'll explain on the way, so please come to
the audience.

\c[6] Talk to the gatekeeper of the Old King Street gate. He should
let you through to the castle. \c[0]

parameters.text:

parameters:
text = You can now enter Megista Castle from the Ancient Kings
Street

Hello. Actually, I have something to talk to you about the people you
caught.

As you have progressed through each main scenario, the final scenario
has now occurred. Please be aware that there may be events that will
no longer occur depending on your choices.

It's important and it concerns you. I would appreciate it if you could
spare some time.
I see. I'm also curious... May I ask you about it?

If possible, I would like to talk in a place other than this church...
Also, I would like to avoid places like a bar where I don't know who
might be listening.
……？ Let's see... Where would be a good place...
You kept me waiting. I am the ruler of this region of Melgius, \n[51].

My lord, it is an honor to meet you. I am Enicia, from the Saint
Luminia Chapel on Horseshoe Street.
Yes...? D-Did I do something rude?

No, it's nothing. Thank you for coming. ...You don't have to be so
nervous.

I have heard from my subordinates about your contribution to the ghost
disturbance.
Oh no, it's too much. There is only so much I can do...

That's not true. The citizens seem to be a little relieved after
hearing rumors about you.

That's good to hear. Is that why you came this time... to tell me
about it?
That's part of it, but... I have one request this time.

I-I'm not sure if I can be of any help, but if there's anything I can
do...

I'm glad to hear you say that. The truth is, there are many
inexplicable points in this ghost incident.
The places where evil spirits appear are biased in some way.

Of course, they appear in ordinary homes as well, but incidents occur
more frequently in the homes and workshops of craftsmen.

It's as if someone is trying to weaken the production power of
Megista. On top of that, suspicious merchants are selling iron tools
and weapons at high prices. It would be fine if they were just taking
advantage of a business opportunity, but... it all seems very fishy.

So, are you saying that someone is intentionally causing the ghost
incidents...?
I think so, but... without evidence, I can't say anything for sure.

However, it's not good to leave things as they are. The request is for
you to protect the craftsmen.

Right now, Megista is already suffering from a shortage of craftsmen.
And yet, there are also craftsmen who have left the city due to this
ghost commotion.

However, due to the increase in monsters, the demand for weapons and
armor has risen. The equipment of the guards is barely prepared. If
any more craftsmen leave, it will become a serious problem.

Let me explain the situation. Please listen to the request of the
craftsmen who are troubled by the ghosts.

……And if someone is intentionally causing this commotion, there is a
possibility that they will eventually reveal themselves if you
continue to deal with it.
In any case, we will pay a reward that matches the results.

(Although I've finished repaying my debt... I can't just ignore people
who are in trouble.)
(...I can't just ignore people who are in trouble.)

Understood. I don't know if I can be of help, but I will accept the
request.
I see. I'm counting on you. I'm asking for your help then.

If deemed necessary for the request, by showing the permit, it is
possible to enter even the places where entry is prohibited. Please do
not abuse it.

Yes, I will gratefully make use of it. Such things should not happen
under the protection of our Rista Church, but... I apologize for not
having enough power.

No... I have no intention of asking too much of a mere nun. I am aware
that the authority of the church has declined in this region.

(…This town is the birthplace of Luminea, who was canonized by the
mainstream of the Rista Church... It's strange that faith is
declining in that place...)
……Well, that's all from me. Do you have anything to add?

I see. If there is anything, don't hesitate to come to the castle. I
will try to handle it as much as possible.
Oh, but you must be busy...
That's right but... A-anyway, let's make time for it.
Well then, I'll return to my duties. Please take care of things.

(Lord, even though you are still young, you seem to be a splendid
person.)

(Can I really solve the evil spirit uproar...? However, many people are
troubled. As a servant of Lady Rista, I must do my best.)
Let's help the craftsmen of Megista who are troubled by evil spirits.

Welcome, Enicia-chan. It's rare for you to show up at my place.

Welcome. Did you come to drink? We also have confidence in our food,
so please order.

……Oh, if it isn't Enicia from the small church. It's rare for you to

Hello, \n[26] . I didn't come to drink. Actually, I was wondering if I

Huh, you're here...? We were just in need of some extra help, but I

Is it still difficult for someone like me?

No, it's not that there's a problem with you... It's just that, you
know, this is that kind of place and the customers are...

customers might increase, but...)

I have some circumstances and need money. If it's not a problem, could

……I understand, I understand. However, since it's a job dealing with

Yes, I understand. I'm prepared for it.

In that case, I'll rely on you starting from today. Honestly, we're

You won't be able to move easily in those clothes. We have a uniform

Enicia started working as a waitress at the bar.
You did well today. Please come work for us again.

even if picked, thanks to their mysterious life force. You can also
obtain compensation by giving them to the herbalist.
Hello... I have something I would like to ask you about.

The head of the orphanage, Mother Narsia, has contracted Black Veil
Disease... That is truly unfortunate.

Yes... So, the director suggested that we also hear your story,
Enicia. \n[28]

……That's also unusual. For that director to go out of their way to talk
to me like that.

That person looks down on traditional medicine, perhaps due to their
pride in having studied the latest medicine in the capital. Despite
there being many things to learn...
I-Is that so...? There are various things going on, huh...

Well, I do want to be of help since I was introduced, but... I can
only think of things that are just a placebo at best.

At best, it's just enough to maintain your physical strength with
medicinal herbs that have nourishing effects... Currently, that's
about the only thing that has a proven effect as a countermeasure
against Black Veil Disease.
……I see... Of course, even that alone would be helpful...

……Just... if it's okay with my opinion... I don't think Black Veil
Disease is just an ordinary illness.

To be honest, I feel that the disease is very unnatural. It's not
spreading explosively, but it's not being eradicated either... For
many years, the number of patients has always remained relatively
constant.

In the traditional medicine that I have learned, the causes of illness
are classified into several categories such as injury, organ, flow,
energy, mind, and so on.

『'Injury' refers to those caused by injuries or trauma, literally.
'Organ' refers to diseases of the internal organs. 'Flow' refers to
those caused by the flow of bodily fluids.

『'Mind' refers to those caused by mental factors. 'Energy'... is a
difficult concept to explain in detail, but it is said to be caused by
something very small and invisible.

Each illness has its own tendencies in terms of symptoms and treatment
methods. However, we don't even know which category Black Veil Disease
falls under.

However... there is something that personally concerns me. In the
past, there were people who researched Black Veil Disease with the
approach that it is not a disease, but a curse or something magical.

\c[6]Klaia Celine\c[0] is a magician who claims to be well-versed in
all kinds of magic to a moderate extent... She's a strange one, but
apparently she came to Megista to research Black Veil Disease.

Is there anyone like that...? So, what were the results of the
research...?

In the end, that theory was never fully verified. For some reason, the
research was abandoned midway, and Klaia Celine left Megista several
years ago.

Of course, they may have realized that it was not a magical disease
and stopped the research, but in the end, no one knows what the final
verification results were.

So that's how it is... I've talked at length, but the prevailing
theory is that we don't know the true nature of the disease. I'm sorry
I couldn't be of help.
No, not at all... Thank you very much.

By the way, I'm not sure if this can be called a clue, but... \c[6]the
magician's disciple is still living in Megista\c[0]. I think it's
somewhere around Horseshoe Street...
I see. Is that so? ...I would definitely like to hear more about it.

Unfortunately, I don't know the name, but if you have any idea, please
go and visit.

(Shall we look for someone who seems knowledgeable in magic and curses,
like the apprentice of the magician who was researching Black Veil
Disease...?)

Enicia explained that she found this while investigating the cause of

At the very least, there have been no such places in the knight's

If that's the case... why is there no report? Why did they go to such

……Oops. Anyway, that's all I know. Did it help?

events.name: 師匠のアトリエ手がかり

parameters:
There seems to be a memoir left by Cryer Cillin... Records on the
Black Vein Disease [Author: Rainbow[ Gem] Cryer Cillin]

I left the capital and visited the old capital, Megista. There is
someone I know in Megista, but I was also interested in the incurable
disease called Black Vein Disease.

I felt that it was undoubtedly a curse when I saw the black mark that
appeared somewhere on the patient's body.

That being said, even if it is a curse, who is the practitioner, what
is their purpose, and by what means are they creating this curse
disease called Black Vein Disease?

In the first place, the possibility of the practitioner being alive is
equivalent to being non-existent. This Black Vein Disease has existed
since the time when Megista was the capital, in other words, more than
a hundred years ago.

At the very least, it is not my job to investigate such factual
matters. My goal is simply to verify that this disease is caused by a
curse. If possible, I also wanted to discover a cure.

And for several years, I have been active mainly in Megista, and have
conducted research on Black Vein Disease in my spare time.

The people at the clinic look at me suspiciously, but from my
perspective, those who treat Black Vein Disease as a normal illness
are the ones who are strange.

I had the opportunity to talk with the daughter of an herbalist who
practices traditional medicine with a musty smell, and she was
reasonably intelligent, so it was fruitful. There are many
superstitions in traditional medicine, but sometimes there are things
that approach the essence.

As a result of seeing several magical approaches and their reactions,
I was convinced that Black Vein Disease is a disease caused by a
curse. Honestly, I had a conviction that this was almost certainly the
case.

Next, it was finally time for the main research to begin, to determine
specifically what kind of magical power the curse has and how one
becomes infected through what kind of process.

However, my surroundings have become increasingly uneasy. At first, it
was just a matter of evil spirits appearing in my atelier, but
gradually various things began to happen when I ignored them
completely.

Even so, when I continued to ignore it... I began to receive direct or
indirect threats repeatedly. Perhaps there is someone who would be
troubled if this fact were to become public.

I'm not satisfied, but it's probably best to back off here. I have a
feeling that something big is involved. If I push too hard, it could
cause a major disaster.

In the first place, this land gives off a bad feeling. Evil spirits
and undead creatures tend to appear strangely, and there are many
unsettling movements within the territory.

『Even though I, who has received the embarrassing nickname of Rainbow
Gem Witch and has a moderate understanding of various systems, cannot
use divine arts, which are the use of miracles.

The only regret I have is about the disciple I picked up in this town.
He has natural talent and good instincts. With self-study, he will
become a decent witch.

I think I can't make friends because my personality is damn gloomy and
negative. I felt sorry for myself, so I just made some stray cats
around here my familiars. Well, it's like a witch-like thing, isn't
it? I don't know.

So, let's hurry back to the royal capital. It's about time I started
to miss urban cuisine. Farewell, frontier.

Oh, come to think of it, I forgot to meet an acquaintance. They seem
to be doing some unsuitable desk work. Let's tease them before going
back.

For now, I will write down the verification methods and ideas for
dealing with it. Even if the day comes when I use them is uncertain, I
intend to keep the atelier itself.
That person had quite the unique personality.

Phew... My master is this kind of person... There's no point in
getting angry every time...
……Even so, Momoko, you were just a stray cat around here, huh...

……However, there was a big clue. As expected, the Black Crest Disease is
caused by sorcery.

……Since there are no verification results left, it's not certain...
B-but at the very least, I don't think my master would leave a lie in
their notes...

……So you returned to the royal capital before conducting any concrete
research. It seems like various ominous things have been happening...

…………I suddenly returned, so I thought I might have been abandoned, but it
seems that's not the case...
You had a high opinion of \n[34], didn't you?

…………Enicia. Take me to the director of that orphanage. I will verify if
what my master said is true.

parameters.message:
From the diary of Cria Syllin, we obtained information about

curse and its countermeasures. Let's head to the clinic

parameters:
message = From the diary of Kurea Cylind, it is said that the Black

This is the house that belonged to Enicia's master, Ms. Cryer.

Y-Yes... My master called it an atelier for some reason... But it was
probably just influenced by something...

Although it doesn't look like it, a magic barrier has been set up...
You can't enter without the key that I'm holding... There might be
dangerous things inside, so it's better not to touch too many
things...

Understood. For now, let's search for any clues. Ms. Cryer, I
apologize but could you please show us inside the atelier?

Even if you say that, it's tough and the salary is low. I can't keep

(I don't want to believe it, but... as Lord's concern, it seems that

someone...)

(If that's the case, something bad will surely happen... I have to do

(But, I don't have any clues... What should I do? For now, should I try

(Although the issue with the craftsmen has been resolved for now, it's

parameters.message: Let's do some questioning on the Old King Street.

parameters: message = Lets do some questioning on the Old King Street

The nearby places have been thoroughly searched and only old coins are
found. That's why many people do things like escorting or being a
little like mercenaries to earn a living. Most explorers are like
that.

Hm? Would you like to have a drink together? I'll tell you some
interesting stories. After that, maybe we can go somewhere to have
fun...
N-No... Actually, there's something I wanted to ask you about.

Oh, I see. You're talking about that suspicious guy. I never thought
he could be the culprit of the evil spirit incident.

No, it's not decided yet... But since there seems to be a connection,
could you listen to me a little more?
Talking about it... I already told the guards almost everything.

After having a drink late at night at the bar, on the way to the inn,
\c[6]there was a guy wearing a black robe, wandering around the
craftsman's house\c[0].

Looking back now, his behavior was quite suspicious... Well, to be
honest, he looked like the type who would often be around shady areas,
so at that time I just thought he was a simple burglar or something.

Well, since I saw him, I reported it just in case. But later I found
out that there was an evil spirit incident right there soon after.

(That man in the black robe... he certainly seems suspicious. There is
a possibility that he might be the one causing the incident.)

(However... waiting for that person in the robe to appear and keeping
watch over each and every craftsman's house and workshop...? That
would be difficult, wouldn't it?)

As expected, you don't know who that person is, right? How should we
go about finding them...

Who knows... Since he hasn't been caught, there's really nothing we
can say about it.
That's right... Thank you very much.

Well, you don't have to think about it too seriously, you know? I
heard that many places have been applying some kind of holy oil or
something lately to prevent evil spirits from appearing.
(Enicia... You spread the holy oil to the craftsmen, didn't you?)

(...I see. Thanks to spreading the holy oil, there should be more places
now where evil spirits don't appear...)

(...In that case... If that person in the robe is intentionally summoning
evil spirits, we might be able to narrow down the targeted locations.)

(Let's ask Narmes if there are any craftsmen who haven't had holy oil
applied yet.)
I-I see. I don't really understand, but do your best.

It's the Crest of Rista. Atmosphere: \v[116](\v[115]) Popularity:
\v[114]

Repay by the deadline. The method is not important. A special debt
reduction method based on the contract crest is offered, but it is up
to you whether to use it or not.

The contract crest is a magical pattern engraved for the purpose of
repayment. During the grace period until the repayment deadline, there
will be no harm to the debtor.

By performing the act determined by the practitioner, the debt will be
automatically reduced through the contract crest. The content of the
act can be freely set by the practitioner.

If the debt is not repaid by the deadline, or if the debtor tries to
escape or avoid the effect of the crest, their body will be seized by
the contract crest as a violation of the contract at that time.

……Oh my, it took quite a while. So, did you have the land deed?

I apologize for keeping you waiting. Um... I'm sure it should be here,

……Well then, this should be fine around here. There was no such thing

No, it's not a lie...! I will definitely find it.
It won't be found. Because there is a proper document here.

What \n[21] took out was a document that showed the land rights. The
lord's seal was stamped on it, and it certainly showed that the
ownership of this land belonged to the Jemmett Company.
Did you understand? That's why, if you could move out today...
Please wait... There must be some kind of misunderstanding...

Don't you think you might be mistaken? It's only been about a year

(....Certainly, I do remember seeing the document. However... I didn't

It would be troublesome if it's ambiguous.... We are only doing honest

I-I'm sorry... However, could you please wait a little longer? I can't

I don't understand. Why would you be so insistent on this run-down
church? I did a little investigation.

The previous priest passed away and for some reason, no successor
came... Now, it's in a state where it's being maintained by just one
nun like you. Wouldn't it be better to just let it go?

Even so... for the people who come to pray and for the next priest who
will come, I must protect this church.

I see. You truly are a devout person. However, we are also in the
business, so there's nothing we can do about it.

However, well... it's also unbearable to forcibly drive you out. I
have one proposal.

Jimet Trading Company also does money lending... I will lend you the
money for the land rights document, so how about you buy the land with
it?

I'll give you a grace period for repayment. However... you must accept
the contract seal.

Contract seal. Well... it's a spell to ensure that you fulfill the
contract... It's just a charm. Hehehe...
I have set three rules for the contract seal. You must abide by them.

parameters.text:
1. In case of violation of the contract, the subject must obey
the sorcerer.  2. To prevent escape and curse removal, the
sorcerer must be informed of the subject's information. 3.
Based on agreement, addition and overwriting of contract
contents and conditions are possible.

(......Why did it have to come to this... But, I can't go against \n[25]'s
words.)

……Why is that? Even though it's not for me to say, I feel like I've done
something pretty bad.

……I understand that. Even so, the fact remains that you have always been
kind to me.

Since I was young, you have visited the church... You patted my head
and gave me food...
Even Uncle \n[25] shouldn't have been lying... I believe that...

……Is it okay with you, Enicia-chan? We will be letting a sinner go in
front of God's eyes.
Even so, I cannot forget that I have been taken care of by you.
……I see. Honestly, it seems like you've raised a good girl, Lord \n[8].

……If that's the case, do as you please. Of course, I will cut off all
ties with the Jimet Company.
……For now, I will go and tell this to the knight.
Do as you please. By the way... what will happen to the Jimet Company?

As you have clear connections with the former nobles... I think the
guards will intervene.

I see... But I think \n[21] has probably already disappeared. I can't
quite put it into words, but there was something strange about that
man...
……I will go and tell this to the knight.

events.name: 聖女ルミネアについて

parameters:
Enicia is one of the saints who was canonized by the Rista Church.
Although the exact dates of her birth and death are unknown, she was
active during the 1400s on the continent.

It is said that \n[6] was born into an ordinary Rista family and grew
up as a devout believer.

The person who stood up against the tyrant known as the Undead King,
Agor. They liberated Megista from Agor's rule, which was filled with
corruption.

She was able to use miraculous powers, also known as sacred magic.
There are many legends that she performed numerous miracles such as
healing, removing curses, and creating large-scale barriers.

\n[6] disappeared afterwards and it is said that she spent the rest of
her life in obscurity. After some time, she was canonized as a saint
of Rista.

The park located on Hati Street was created in commemoration of her.
The stone monument is engraved with words praising her along with a
biblical verse.

A church named after her was built on the site of her family's home in
Megista, but strangely, unique flowers that cannot be found elsewhere
bloom around the church.
……！ May I see that crown? Please tell me honestly how you obtained it.
Ah, yes. Well, this item is...

Enicia talked about the circumstances of obtaining the \c[6]ancient
king's crown\c[0]. She also spoke about what she learned during the
exploration of the Dearshiel ruins.

……Dearshiel Deep Palace... The crown that represents the royal authority
of the last king of the Carvain Dynasty. This is undoubtedly a
national treasure...
It was such a valuable item, wasn't it?

To be clear, this cannot be bought as an ordinary treasure. It is
subject to confiscation and you have an obligation to hand it over.

……However, due to the policy of the lord who is promoting the acceptance
of explorers, we cannot offer the full value of the item, but we can
buy it from you.

Let's see... If we estimate the maximum cost we can offer... It would
be around \c[6]\v[101] gold\c[0], I suppose.
So... at such a high price...?
Yes, that is an item with such historical and political value.

While we cannot allow you to keep it, we can hold onto it for a while
as long as you promise not to sell it to anyone else. We don't think
you would do such a thing though...
Of course... I would never do such a thing.
If you decide to sell the crown, please let me know.

We will buy the treasures and artifacts discovered in the ruins here.
The ruins are the property and assets of the lord. Please be careful
not to sell them to illegal merchants or the like.

Certainly, I have received it. I am looking forward to the next
achievement.

\c[6]Please sell us the Ancient King's Crown. (Acquisition price:
\c[6]\v[101] \g\c[0])

I have certainly received it. Thank you for your cooperation. Although
it becomes the property of the lord here... it will probably end up in
the hands of the royal family afterwards.

I see. I don't know the reason but... the Del family has been
collecting items inherited from the Carbine family since ancient
times.

Enicia handed over the crown and received a dizzying amount of
currency in exchange...

I have received words of appreciation from the lord regarding the
crown. The Del family will remember this, and it will ultimately
benefit Megista.

I am a ruins supervisor dispatched by the lord. As there are still
looters who sell artifacts through illegal routes, I purchase
artifacts directly from explorers.

(......There's a man here..... Well, it's to be expected since it's a mixed
bath... Ugh, what should I do?)

(......I should at least go to a place where people in the back won't see me,
so I don't expose too much skin.)
(...As usual...there are only men here, huh?)
(....Looking this way....why do I feel so nervous...)
マップイベント呼び出し
マップイベント呼び出し
Oh...? Could it be that you are...

Enicia-chan. Actually, I found an untouched ruin. Let's go together,
just the two of us.
Eh, umm... Just the two of us?

Oh, there's definitely a great treasure there. When we go, \c[6]invite
me to the party, and let's go just the two of us.\c[0]
マップイベント呼び出し
Hey Enicia-chan. Come sit over here, let's have a fun drink together.
Okay. I'll come with you when you go somewhere.
When you hire me, it's better to be alone together. Hehe...
……Hey, how about we go to an inn together from now on?
マップイベント呼び出し
……Hey, you with the fluffy pink hair over there.
Hm, fluffy? Could it be that you're talking about me...?

You're the only one here, right? Are you perhaps a nun from the Church
of Horseshoe Street?

Yes, that's right. I am Enicia, a nun who is taking care of the St.
\n[6] Church as a representative...

(...Hmmm... So this person... Even though she's a nun, she's got some nice
stuff.)

Nice to meet you, Enicia. I heard a rumor that you can use healing
magic, is that true?

I'm not sure if you're talking about me, but I do know some sacred
arts including healing magic... Is it possible that someone here is
injured?
It's not like that... Ah, but I haven't introduced myself yet.

I am \n[51], an adventurer. That frivolous-looking man over there is
\n[52].
Huh? Hey, don't introduce me in a weird way. I'll be put off.
Be careful. This person has no sense of propriety at all.

Even so, both of you are adventurers. I've heard that adventurers
explore ancient ruins from past eras and bring back artifacts and
discoveries.

U-um... It's not that impressive, you know. Most of us, including
myself, are in it for the money. The only difference between us and
grave robbers is that we have permission from the lord.

I think there's a big difference... So, what brings adventurers to
someone like me, a nun?

Well then, let's get to the main topic. Enicia, I'm not forcing you,
but would you like to join our party?

Shall we explore ruins together? That's what I mean. Of course, you
can rest assured that we are legitimate explorers with permission to
explore.

Ex-exploring ruins...!? Someone like me? I might be a bother to Lord
\n[51] and \n[52]...

Hey, please stop with the formalities. We're about the same age,
right?
I'm fine with Enicia joining us too.

You're too familiar. And your eyes are creepy. Enicia, there's a
reason why I invited you.

It's not like we're asking you to fight monsters. Enicia, you just
need to heal us when we get injured. Leave the fighting to me. \n[51]
will handle scouting and trap disarming.
Why are you inviting me so much?
Do you know about the \c[6]Dearshiel Ruins\c[0], Enicia?

I have heard of it. It is a very old underground ruins located to the
south of Megista...

Yes. It is said to be from a time long before the Del Kingdom was
established. Despite the many relics that come out, there are few
historical materials, and it is a very mysterious era.

Well, regardless of its historical value... the contents have long
been excavated and there is nothing noteworthy left. At least, that's
what was thought until recently.

Between you and me, we recently discovered a passage leading to an
unknown level in that ruins that was thought to have been completely
excavated.

This is still only known by a few of our fellow explorers... but
eventually, I think it will spread and many explorers will come
rushing in.

We want to grab the treasure before many people come, that's the
reason.

However, the interior is still mostly untouched, and monsters have
also taken up residence. We don't even know what kind of traps there
are. It's doubtful that we can explore it unscathed.

But then again, if we stock up on expensive magic potions and can't
make a profit, we'll be in trouble. It's better to find a healer and
split the reward among us.
I see... I think it's a very good story.

Well, we don't know how much treasure there is, and we can't guarantee
the actual profit... but if there is valuable treasure, it will be
quite a lucrative venture.

As I said earlier, we are official explorers, so you can rest assured
that there will be no dispute over the share later on.

(…It may be worth considering as a way to repay the debt. It's dangerous
and uncertain, but...)
……Understood. I can't answer right away, but I'll think about it.
We're usually at this bar. Come by if you feel like it.
……Feel free to talk about personal matters too, Enicia.
\n[31], are you an idiot? Don't worry about it, he doesn't have any sense...

His skills are good, but he's scum who laid hands on a high-class girl
and ran away from the capital.
H-huh... You came from the capital...

Since she's a healer that we finally found in Megista on the frontier,
if you lay a hand on her, I'll really kill you.

Ah, that's right. If you need any other help besides exploring ruins,
like escorting, just let me know.
Yes, please count on me when that time comes.
Enicia finished talking with the explorers.

(…I received an amazing invitation. I thought that ruins exploration was
unrelated to just a nun like me...)

(…However, if it helps me to obtain the necessary amount, it might be
worth considering to take the plunge and accept the offer...)
Hmm, Enicia. So, have you thought about that thing we talked about?

Okay. Then, when you go, let me know. You can't enter the ruins
\c[6]without a fellow explorer\c[0], so be sure to invite someone. I
don't recommend the red flashy guy in front of you though.

Oh, and the departure time is from \c[6]morning until evening\c[0].
It's dangerous to walk in the dark at night. I think it's better to
leave as early as possible.

It is now possible to head to the ruins for exploration with fellow
adventurers. You can head to the Deashil ruins from the Ancient King's
Street.

In dungeon exploration, various items can be obtained, but battles
also occur. Treasures and relics such as precious metals and gems
obtained can be purchased by the \c[6]ruins supervisor\c[0] at the
Explorer's Association.

Agor Aman Del, the 38th king of the Del Kingdom. A king with both
merits and demerits who brought prosperity and decline to the capital
city of Megista.

Despite several attempts at assassination, all of them failed. Due to
rumors that he could manipulate the art of controlling life, he was
respectfully called the Undead King.

Under the king's rule, while the Del Kingdom prospered overall,
centralizing policies caused resentment among local nobles and the
people.

Moreover, there were frequent rumors that he used evil sorcery, and
the Archbishop of the Gospel Church, the head temple of the Lester
religion, criticized him by name. This increased the momentum for
rebellion.

The rebellion spread throughout the entire kingdom, but nearly half of
the kingdom's nobles remained neutral. In the end, the rebels emerged
victorious, and King Agor was killed, ending his life in his mid-
forties.

King Agor did not allow many people to approach him personally. It
seems that he only interacted with a very limited number of close
aides on a regular basis.

Therefore, while the people around Agor at that time are generally
understood, there is testimony that he had a silver-haired man of
unknown origin as a close aide, but there is no solid evidence of the
existence of that person.

Agor was a person with many mysteries, and many novels were later
written based on his life and rebellion.

Some stories say that he fell in love at first sight with his
archenemy, Luminea, and even had secret meetings with her, but these
are obviously fictional with no historical basis.

The Lester Church also officially denies it, and if it goes too far
and tarnishes the honor of Saint Luminea, there are cases where
publication is stopped by requesting a ban on the book.
マップイベント呼び出し

It seems like there will be a lot of people... Should we stay around
this area today?
Oh... if it isn't Enicia from the Horseshoe Street Church.

(The director of the largest clinic in this town... You have visited
our church a few times, but we haven't talked much, have we?)
Of course. I know that it was a difficult situation in many ways.

If you were in need of money, you should have just sold the church's
land and worked for us. You can use healing magic, can't you?

I cannot do that... I cannot give up that place that I am entrusted
with by the former priest.

I see... well, it seems like it's already taken care of. However, if
you have time, would you like to help treat patients? I'll even pay
you for it.

(If it can be of help to people suffering from injuries or illness... I
might try doing it.)
Of course. I know that it was a difficult situation in many ways.

If you're in need of money, why don't you just sell the church's land
and work for us instead? You can use healing magic, can't you?

I cannot do that... I cannot give up that place that I am entrusted
with by the former priest. In any case, we have already made a
contract...

I see... that's unfortunate. However, if you have time, would you like
to help treat patients? I'll even pay you for it.

(Assisting at the clinic... It's uncomfortable to use sacred magic for
money, but it's for the church...)

(Even if it's not the case, if it can be of help to people suffering
from injuries or illness... I might try doing it.)
That's a very grateful offer. I'll think about it.

I would like you to do that. And also... Do you know the name of the
disease that once threatened the people in this area?
That is... I know. It's the Black Vein Disease.

I see... When infected, black spots appear on the body and the person
becomes weak. It's a disease unique to this region.

Black Vein Disease causes weakness, but it is rare for it to be fatal.
However, the productivity of the town has greatly decreased.
Unfortunately, at that time, the disease could not be cured by any
means of medicine or magic.

……Oh? I've heard that the people with Black Vein Disease are being cured
one after another...

Y-Yes, that may be true... but not all of them. There are still
patients who come and suffer even now.

(...The issue should have been resolved when the former noble canceled the
contract... but there are still people who haven't been cured...)

Lately, the number of patients has been increasing slightly. We must
overcome this disease soon.

(...I see... Grandma... Even the head of the Narsia, Enicia, has fallen
ill with Black Vein Disease...)
I see... That is certainly very concerning.

So, I am personally making medicine to counteract the Black Vein
Disease. It's for preparation in case it resurges.
That's wonderful. But, is there anything I can do to help?

Actually, I want you to cooperate in testing the new medicine. It's
not difficult, you just have to administer it and observe the
situation.

Is it okay if I participate? I don't have any symptoms of Black Vein
Disease in particular...

No problem. It's a test to investigate the side effects. However, it's
a risky job, so I'll pay you extra.

……Huh? What are you looking at? Have you fallen for me?

Excuse me... Are you the one who brought the wooden box over here?

……I never said that those people were inside the wooden box... Why did
you come up with such an idea?

Ah... S-shut up. Despite my appearance, I have a rich imagination.
Anyway, I don't know.
Um... if it's okay with you, may I check inside the warehouse?

This is a warehouse of a certain trading company. You can't pass. Go
back.

……Is there any way I could ask you to let me take a quick look inside?
I'll leave as soon as I see just a little bit.
Discipline is important. What's wrong is wrong.
(… I can't force my way through... What should I do?)
Huh? What are you picking up?
(…! This is the same hair ornament that I gave to \n[12] before…)

……Is there any way you could let me pass? If it's even just a little
bit, I can pay you as thanks...

Oh, you understand. Heheh, money is good but... it wouldn't be bad to
have you as a partner with that body...

I'd like to say yes, but I have a scary boss. Some things are just
impossible.

……I see. Um, please let me apologize first. If I was wrong, I will make
up for my mistake.
Hit with the Corner of the Sacred Text
Hit with the Corner of the Sacred Text
Hit with the Corner of the Holy Scripture
……Y-You fainted perfectly... or rather... Are you okay?

……Ugh, to use the holy scripture for something like this... Ah, I must
cast healing magic on it later.

events.name: カーバイン王朝の伝説

parameters: \>Legend of the Carbine Dynasty \>[Author: Hor Ard]
Obsolete Currency of a Fallen Nation

The ancient dynasty that existed before the establishment of the Del
Kingdom. It boasted such prosperity that it was called the country
where the golden flower blooms, but it perished for some reason.

There are various theories about the cause, but the most likely one is
that it was destroyed by the evil dragon Moruvink.

The last king was Elmore Carbine. He is said to be the greatest king
among the Carbine kings and carried out various projects. Famous ruins
such as the Deashir ruins in Megista were also built during his reign.

Numerous relics from that time are still being discovered. The Old
Currency of the Ruined Country found within the territory of Melgius
is from this era.

Due to the large number of discoveries, each individual item does not
have a significant value, but there are passionate collectors who will
immediately buy them up when they appear on the market.

It is said that research in magic was more advanced than in modern
times, and even a fragment of that knowledge has value.

Lost magical knowledge is also sometimes discovered, and such ancient
books are highly valued, but most of them are bought up by the Round
Table of Sages, a school of magic.

The manufacturing technology of magical creatures is also very
advanced, and there are many magical defense mechanisms that are still
in operation inside the ruins. In other words, there is a high
possibility that valuable things are sleeping in places where such
dangers are abundant.

lately? Actually, they appeared in my house too.

I thought ghosts would be more modest when they appear... but they
wander around the house and attack normally... there's no way I can
live there.

*Sigh*... I wish someone could do something. At this rate, I won't be
able to go home.

Oh, it's you. I was fine for a while, but evil spirits have appeared
again... It's really frustrating.
Oh...! Can you really do something about it? I'll leave it to you.

events.name: ゴールイベント幽霊退治

parameters:
Geez, this trading company is so lax. We went through a lot of trouble
just to trap one nun, and this is how it turned out. Don't you think
so?

But well, that obedient kid saved us. He understands his position
well. He was quiet even when he was packed in a wooden box.

If it goes well, I'll receive a huge amount of money and a reward that
can't be compared to such a thing.

Listen, just stay quiet and behave yourself, okay? If you make a fuss,
I'll really sell you off.
What's wrong? It's not time for the guard change yet.
Wha...!? Hey, why is this woman here... Did someone betray us?

I don't know who you are, but... that outfit... you're a seeker,
right? Please return \n[12].

……I'm a seeker \n[52]. It seems like there's a misunderstanding, but I
just found a lost child and protected them.

……W-What a lie! Enicia told me that she has a lot of debt and that there
was a way to help her...

……But, being brought here... Ah, they're going to sell me off to a
foreign country... *sob*...
……Selling you off is just a threat. Stop crying like a baby.

……What is your purpose for doing something like this...? I just finished
paying off my debt.
Who knows. I was just asked to do it, so I don't know.
……Is it a problem for you if I pay off my debt? Who are you...

That's why I don't know... Ask the guys who requested me. Well, I
can't guarantee you'll be able to go home though.

The plan has gone awry, but I can't just let you go home now... I
guess we'll have to send you both off to a foreign country after all.
……！　I won't let you do such a thing...!

Something like this works well on kind sisters like you, right? So,
behave yourself. Otherwise, the kid will suffer.

I have to accomplish my goal no matter what. In order to obtain the
benefits of Kuromon...!
I'm okay, Enicia sis... so please run away...

(Shaking like that... There's no way I can abandon them and run away
from here... But what should I do?)

Heheh... That's right, that's good. Geez, making me do something like
a typical third-rate villain.
Might as well enjoy peeling off the skin here...
You won't be saying that you don't know my face.

That's right. I'm the Branch Manager of the Explorer's Association
Megista Branch, \n[53].
(I'm really shaken... But, why is the Branch Manager here...?)

Actually, I just received a message from one of our explorers. I came
to take a peek at the warehouse on the pier, and it was easily
penetrated... Are they doing it on purpose? Hm?
N-No... About earlier... It was a joke, hehe...

Since before, there has been a suspicion that the association's
movements have been leaked to the grave robbers. We knew there was a
mole. We let it swim for a while and had a trustworthy explorer
investigate it.

(Is it possible... that you are the female explorer who was on the
streets of Marusta?)

Guiding the grave robbers, smuggling excavated artifacts, ignoring
exploration restrictions... And to top it off, are they pretending to
kidnap people?

Wow, truly impressive. You've been doing quite a lot while still
wearing the association's title.

Hey, Explorer \n[52]... Do you think you can spend your time
peacefully in prison? Hm?

Th-This is... a mistake... Yes, I just protected a lost child and was
going to return her to her family...
探索者資格を持っている場合と分岐

……It seems that way. You over there are also one of our explorers,
right? Is what I heard just now true?
……It seems so. How about you? Is what you just said true?

……No. That person is a kidnapper. Even now, they are holding that child
hostage and trying to harm me.
Hic... Don't... you dare come any closer! This kid will die!
Nice... Nice, really nice...! I love that kind of thing!

That being said... it's a shame that you're just a third-rate
explorer. Boring. Farewell.
\n[12]...! I'm glad... Are you hurt...? Does anything hurt?
Um, Enicia-san... Thank you so much for your help.

No, this is the fault of the Association. Besides, it's my personal
hobby to beat up guys like this. Don't worry about it. Ah, I feel
refreshed.
Ha, ha... Anyway, thank you very much. Um, is this person okay?

parameters: >About the ruins around Megista. [Author: Etna Keily]
Underground ruins of the ancient kingdom

There used to be an ancient kingdom in the Megista area. Many remnants
of it still remain as underground ruins.

Surprisingly, excavated artifacts show that some were made with more
advanced technology than what we have now. It is believed that they
were particularly ahead in terms of magical technology.

It is very mysterious why such a developed ancient city declined and
why their technology was lost.

At one time, many explorers gathered and the exploration of ruins was
thriving, but now it has already died down due to the fact that
notable ruins have been excavated and the influence of relocation of
the capital.

It is said that there are still many underground ruins in places that
are difficult for people to enter, even in the Megista region.

It is almost certain that there are still many unknown things sleeping
underground, even in areas where hidden layers are found in ruins that
have already been fully explored.

Enicia is one of the saints who was enrolled in the Rista religion.
Although the exact dates of birth and death are unknown, she was a
prominent figure in the continent during the 1400s.

\n[6] is said to have been born into an ordinary Rista family and
raised as a devout believer.

However, the era was struck by a great turmoil. A certain sorcerer
commanded an immortal army and invaded Megista.

The name of the sorcerer was Agor. Although the method is unknown, he
transformed himself into an immortal and was called the Immortal King.

Megista was quickly engulfed and dominated by Agor's army. In the
Megista shrouded in red mist, demons and immortals roamed, and people
were treated as slaves. Agor's rule was filled with decadence.

Those who opposed were executed mercilessly, while those who obeyed
were promised corruption and pleasure. Gradually, there were those
among humans who followed Agor. They were called apostles, and their
numbers increased.

Devout \n[6] did not succumb to it, but instead received various
treatments on her body and mind.

At that time... \n[6] was granted divine magic and used that power to
eliminate the minions of demons. Whether she had the aptitude for it
from the beginning or it was bestowed upon her by the great Rista, it
cannot be verified now.

The girl stood before the sorcerer and destroyed him. However, it is
said that Agor was undoubtedly human, but his evil soul was vulnerable
to divine magic.

\n[6] is said to have disappeared afterwards and is said to have ended
her life in obscurity. Later on, she was enrolled as a saint of Rista
after some time had passed. A church bearing her name was built on the
site of her family's home in Megista.

Her devotion is recorded in many documents, and there is no doubt that
it is true, but now there are voices of skeptics who exaggerate her
achievements or doubt her existence.
\>Types of Magic and Aptitude \>[Author: Dunning Black]

Spirit magic can be used by making a contract with a spirit. The
necessary aptitude is the spirit stone, a gemstone that houses the
spirit, the amount of magical power of the contractor, and the ability
to recognize the spirit.

On the other hand, some magic like sacred magic has a different
principle from other magic, and is a great prayer that manifests part
of God's miracles.

These are distinguished as professional magic Goeti[a] and miracles
Theurgi[a], and there are very few people who have the aptitude to
handle both for some special reason that has not yet been elucidated.

Spirits are a torrent of great power that flows through the natural
world, and except for special cases, they have little to no self-
awareness.

However, by contracting with humans, a phenomenon called
individualization occurs. The individualized spirits are freed from
the torrent of power and become able to act with free will according
to the contract.

In order to make a contract, it is necessary to keep the spirits in
one place. However, usually, since the spirits are constantly flowing
through the earth's veins, it is difficult to communicate with them.

For that purpose, what is necessary is the Spirit Stone introduced in
the following section.

The main method of contracting with spirits is to use a gemstone
called a Spirit Stone that houses the spirit. Spirits that flow
through the earth's veins occasionally inhabit gemstones, and this is
a method of communicating with the spirits that remain there.

Through this dialogue, a contract is formed, and the spirit undergoes
individualization. The spirit gains free will and becomes an
independent existence that receives magical power from the contractor.

Once a spirit gains consciousness, it dislikes returning to the
torrent of its original power. Therefore, it will generally do its
utmost to lend its power to the contractor through the contract.

It is possible to make contracts with many spirits using multiple
gemstones, but since it is a contract for the provision of magical
power, there are limits based on the magical power possessed by the
individual.

When using a spirit stone that houses multiple spirits, the efficiency
of the magical power provided in the contract is better compared to
using multiple gemstones, and valuable gems such as the Rainbow
Diamond are very expensive.
Jellian comes from anywhere to eat bad children.

From the keyhole of the door, from the gap in the window, from between
the floorboards, from inside the chimney.

While you're sleeping at night, she'll come in from anywhere and eat
the bad children who don't listen to her.

Children who pray properly, children who lock their doors properly,
children who wake up early properly, and children who study properly.

God will protect you, so don't worry. God is always watching over
everyone.

(Nostalgic picture book... I remember being really scared of this when
I was younger, so I tried my best to be a good child...)

Hypnotic magic can be broadly divided into two types: those that
affect the mind and those that affect vision and cognition. Both
require advanced magical knowledge and delicate control.

But who cares about that! Hypnosis is all about spirit! Libido! Ora!
Hypnosis! Release from hypnosis!

With this, you too can become a hypnotic uncle who plants seeds
starting tomorrow! Become one!!!! Become it, ora!!!!!!
Benefits and Risks -> Use and Risks

Jellian is said to be strictly outside the definition of a monster.
The reason is that despite inhabiting anywhere in this world, its
origin and ecology are largely unexplored.

The definition of a monster varies depending on the country or
religion, so it is not necessarily wrong to call it a monster, but it
is not clear whether it is really an animal or a living organism.

Jellian is by no means harmless, but it rarely poses a great danger.
It is also a fact that the cost of extermination outweighs the
disadvantages.

Jellian acquires a wide variety of ecologies depending on the
environment, and there are individuals who become attached to humans.

Furthermore, the body tissue with its mysterious nature is often
utilized for various purposes as a material.

Thus, while there are scholars who continue to sound the alarm that it
is essentially a very dangerous existence, for which coexistence and
utilization are possible, there are few who take it seriously.

parameters:
The old aristocrats of Megista... It's one thing if their descendants
are still around, but for the head of the family back then to have
survived to the present day...
Yes...though there is no conclusive evidence that it was truly her.

I have also heard reports from the knights who were present at the
scene. It is probably worth believing that it is true.

The vassals of King Agor... To them, the Melgius family who
sided with the rebellion can certainly be called traitors. Of course,
as their descendant, I feel not a shred of shame about it.

……Even so, I ended up getting involved in quite a mess. Although, to be
fair, it was a dispute between aristocratic families from a long time
ago.

No... The old aristocrats felt threatened by the Rista Faith itself,
so I think it was inevitable that things turned out this way.

……The decline of the Rista Church within the territory was unnatural...
But to think that the hands of the old aristocrats reached even to the
level of the cardinal of the Gospel See of Rista.
……His Eminence the Cardinal... I can't believe... something like that...

This is not just a matter of betrayal. One of the cardinals sent to
the old aristocrats intentionally weakened the church's power in this
region.

……They must have feared the return of Luminea so much in their pursuit
of restoration.

……Yes, that's right. I don't know what to say, the scale of what really
happened is so large that it makes my head spin.

Even so, now that it has come to light, the downfall of the cardinal
is inevitable. The Rista Church in this region should gradually return
to normal.

……Phew. I thought I had been actively working on the problems within the
territory, but... I'm truly inadequate.

There is no such thing. Everyone says that the lord is ruling very
well.

If you're tired, please come to the church anytime. I think your heart
will be a little more at ease.
……？ What happened? You're staring at me.

(...This is what the common men are gossiping about. This is a natural
charm.)
Thus, peace returned to Enicia's surroundings.

Later, Enicia and Rista were given rewards from the lord. Although
Enicia declined, it was not allowed, so she received it as a donation
to the church.

The Gospel Agency recommended Enicia, who is a nun, to be ordained and
she became the head of the monastery. However, since there is no
monastery in Megista at present, she continued to act as a priest
until it was newly established.

Enicia continues to maintain and manage the Luminea Church. The faith
in Rista's religion in Megista is gradually returning, and the number
of people visiting the church has increased significantly compared to
before.

The \n[21] of the Gimlet Trading Company disappeared after completing
various transfers. Although the company was dissolved, it has already
been reorganized under a new chairman.

The company will be renamed to Bikatto Trading Company in the future,
and aims to mediate work, eliminate underground businesses and theft,
and pursue a clean path.

To cure it, or rather to lift the curse... it's quite difficult. Or
rather, that's what contract magic is.

I don't want to be easily dispelled and have my contract terminated,
so I create complex and inefficient formulas to avoid being dispelled
on purpose... After all, sorcerers are gloomy and wicked...
……Now, you understand when you look at me.
I-I haven't. That's such a rude thing to say.

Anyway... lifting the curse is difficult... Does that mean there's no
way to do anything about it anymore?

I didn't say that. If we can continue to offset the effect of sucking
life force... I don't think there's any need to worry about our
lives...
Is it possible to do such a thing?

I can do it... Consulting with me, Enicia, who will become a great
witch someday and is a disciple of Kurea Shylin, was the right
choice...
Mr. \n[34]... Thank you very much. Please tell me that method.

……Around your church, strange flowers bloom. They bloom all year
round...

Those are the flowers of Lumina... Because they only bloom around that
church, they were named after the miracle brought by Saint Luminea.

Hmm... The origin doesn't matter... If those flowers have such strong
life force, they might be able to offset and alleviate the effects of
this curse...

I'll make a substitute charm for you. However, I'll need some
materials. I'll leave it to you to prepare them...

Okay, I understand. I'll go gather them. Thank you very much, Mr.
\n[34].

\c[6]About 10 \c[0]Flowers of Lumina, 3 \c[6]Elixir of Life\c[0]...
And also... 1 \c[6]Earth Crystal\c[0]...
The other two aside... \c[6]Earth Crystal\c[0]... What is that?

……This is the most important... The Earth Crystal has the power to
connect with the earth... With this effect, it can shoulder the burden
of the life force of those Lumina flowers...

I understand. I don't know the detailed theory of magic... but I trust
you, Mr. \n[34].

Y-Yes... Well... It's a valuable type of spirit stone, so I think
it'll be difficult to find...

T-Then, I'll go back home... Bring the materials when you gather
them... Ah, it's too bright... The sun... Enicia too...
Mr. \n[34] left while narrowing his eyes...

……Thanks to Mr. \n[34], hope has emerged. Let's gather the materials
somehow and hand them over.

You can pick Lumina flowers around the church, and the Elixir of
Life... should be purchasable despite being expensive. The problem is
the Earth Crystal...

……As for obtaining those items... For now, shall we ask \n[2] who is a
merchant?

parameters.message:
I've arranged to have a charm made to alleviate the effects
of the Black Spot Disease. Let's hand over [10 Luminous
Flowers], [3 Elixir of Life], and [1 Earth Spirit Crystal]
to \[34]. Do you know where we can find the Earth Spirit
Crystal? Let's ask \n[2].

text = Lying down with a pained expression

(If you have this amulet, things should get better... But it's
meaningless if you're not on the grounds of the church where the
Lumina flowers are growing...)

(......It pains me to discharge you in this state. But I trust you, so let's
take the director to the orphanage once.)

Enicia informed the nurse that she was being discharged and returned
to the orphanage by carriage with Narsia...
……Phew... Getting the Black Blisters at this age is really tough...

……Enicia... I'm sorry... I burdened you when you were in such a
difficult situation...

I'm Enicia, Director... That's not important. More importantly,
this...

Enicia hands the amulet made by \n[34] to Narsia lying on the bed in

What is this, such a beautiful amulet...? ...Oh my...?

……It's strange. Just by holding this amulet, I suddenly feel much
better...

Yes, yes... Although I had been feeling exhausted as if all my
strength had been drained, it seems like my energy is returning...
(...It seems like it had an effect...! That's good...)

I feel like I'm doing better than before. I can't keep sleeping

I think your physical strength has declined from being bedridden for a

Is that so... Hehe, but if I can freely walk around the church

Ever since my husband passed away a long time ago, taking care of the

(...... To me, she's like a real grandmother. For now, I'm saved. I'm really

(Someday, I'll find the cause and cure it properly... Surely... It will

Miss Nun. You're doing pretty well as an explorer.
Ah, um... I'm honored to hear you say that.

Well, that's beside the point. I have something to discuss with you.
It's about a 'special request'.
A 'special request'...? What is it about?

It's about a request that we will give to an explorer who has free
time. This time, it's not a request from the lord. Anyone who has an
explorer qualification, please accept it for now.
(From the lord... which means it's an important request, right?)

Whether you do it or not is up to you, but if you have the
qualifications, please accept it for now.

Alright, let me explain briefly. Actually, did you know that monsters
have been increasing abnormally in the vicinity of Megista recently?
I've heard about it, but... is it really that serious?

Ah... Because of that, the knight order and the guard unit are busy.
It's starting to affect the maintenance of public order in the city.
N-No... To be honest, it's the first time I've heard of it.

This Megistus territory originally had a fair number of monsters
inhabiting it, but recently the number of individuals has clearly
increased, and the damage has also increased.

That's why the knight order and the guard unit are busy with patrols.
It's starting to affect the maintenance of public order in the city.

So, here's the thing. We want an explorer who has free time to subdue
the monsters and investigate the cause of their increase.

Wild monsters have their own ecosystem balance. There must be a reason
behind the sudden increase. We want you to find out what it is.

I see. So, it means that there's no end to it if we don't solve the
root cause.

That's the story. ...Well, it's cruel to tell a nun about this, but
we've informed everyone who has the qualifications of an explorer.

As for the special request, that's about it. You'll get a reward, but
don't push yourself too hard.

When you receive a special request, talk to a woman named
\c[6]Jonah\c[0] in the back branch manager's room.

(The abnormal outbreak of monsters... As someone who has become an
explorer, I should probably take action towards resolving it.)

From now on, you can receive special requests from Jonah in the branch
manager's room. The ★ mark is related to the scenario.

You seem to have done well. I was just starting to worry about how to
deal with the Nan Kaido incident in particular.

If I was able to be of help, then I'm glad. Also, to think that
something like this was in the place where evil spirits were...

I brought it back as a clue just in case, but it may be dangerous.
Please be careful.

I see... So this is from Nan Kaido? There certainly is a creepy
feeling about it.

……It's not my specialty, but it's probably something used for some kind
of curse. Let's have a magician investigate it.

……Finding something like this means that the possibility of the Nan

In any case, your contribution was very significant. There are still
many incidents involving evil spirits, but I am looking forward to
your continued support.
Yes. I'm glad if I was able to be of help.
It's you. I have another request.

In this town, there are hardly any craftsmen who have spare time now.
They are always busy with work and are in quite a precarious
situation.

Thanks to you, we were able to stop any further leaks, but it has
already affected the lives of the citizens and the defenses of the
city. In fact, the nearby public bathhouse still hasn't been repaired.

……Actually, depending on the conditions, the craftsmen who left may come

Nemes is well-known among the craftsmen and has a good reputation. It
seems that he has also been in contact with the craftsmen who left.
I see... Understood. I'll go listen to the story.

I've also heard from the craftsmen. It seems like you've taken good

It makes me proud as well to have someone like you in this town. You

Thank you very much. However, we still haven't solved the mystery of
why the evil spirits appear.

That's right. We'll continue investigating that matter. Anyway, I want

Actually, regarding the evil spirit incident... there is one piece of

In the middle of the night, a suspicious man was wandering around a
craftsman's workshop.

And then the evil spirits started appearing from the next day...
That's what happened.

At the very least, we cannot let them go free as if they have nothing

The one who witnessed the suspicious figure in a robe was an explorer.

You did well. Since we caught the man who was summoning evil spirits,
there haven't been any new cases of evil spirit damage.

That being said... the ones that have been summoned are still
wandering around. If you have the time, I would like you to deal with
that as well.

As for the man's identity... we will investigate that here. You really
did a great job.

What about after that? If there's anything... No, it would be good to
come and ask even if there's no particular reason.

……By the way, how about having dinner with me as a consolation? Of
course, let's invite the children from the orphanage as well.
I am a busy person, but I will handle it when you visit.

We still need to investigate the evil spirit incident, but for now,
thank you for your hard work.

…………. If you have the time, how about having a meal or something... I
wonder...
No, it's nothing. If there's anything, come visit again.

It is certain that someone intentionally caused the incident. I'm
